resources.string: Baker Hall was one of the first buildings built on campus. It is structure is very unique in that it is connected to Porter Hall and it is sloped. It is one of the largest and most noticeable buildings on campus, created by the first dean of the College of Fine Arts(CFA), Henry Hornbostel. Baker Hall is home to College of Humanities and Social Sciences (HSS), which is the second largest school on campus with more than 60 majors and minors offered.
Map screen is the main screen of Walky Scotty. It shows a whole map of Carnegie Mellon campus. It can be accessed by a button at the bottom that resembles a map.
Directions feature allows users to type in places they want to find routes between. Users have to click on a compass button at the bottom of the screen to go to Directions page.
Search feature allows users to perform two tasks. Users can either type in a place of their interest into the search box for quick search. Also, they can browse through different categories.
Nearby Locations feature allows users see what locations are close to the target location. It shows boxes with pictures of nearby locations so that users can recognize them.
